section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: "DDOT" means the District Department of Transportation
"DPW" means the Department of Public Works
"Golden Triangle BID" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 2-1215.52(b).

"Passenger loading zone" means a curbside street space designated on either a part-time or a full-time basis to permit vehicles to stop to load and unload passengers, either exclusively or concurrently with other uses.

"Prohibited pick-up and drop-off area" means a curbside street space designated near a passenger loading zone in which vehicles are prohibited from picking up and dropping off passengers during designated hours.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6122 of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-434, July 30, 2018, 65 DCR 8200).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6122 of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-458, Oct. 3, 2018, 65 DCR 11212).
